mapper.select: select userEmail from user where userEmail is NOT NULL and userEmail != '' and userAvailable = 1
mapper.insert: insert into user (userID, userName, userEmail, userBirth, userPhone, userPassword, userAvailable, userEmailHash, userEmailChecked) values (#{userID}, #{userName}, #{userEmail}, #{userBirth}, #{userPhone}, #{userPassword}, 1, null, 0)
mapper.select: select userName from user where userID = #{userID} and userPassword = #{userPassword} and userAvailable = 1
mapper.update: update user set userName = #{userName}, userEmail = #{userEmail}, userBirth = #{userBirth}, userPhone = #{userPhone}, userPassword = #{userPassword} where userID = #{userID}
